summary: A successful Danish family faces agonizing choices when its charismatic patriarch falls ill.
cast: Jesper Christensen|Lene Maria Christensen|Pilou Asbæk|Anne Louise Hassing|Line Kruse|Coco Hjardemaal|Gustav Fischer Kjærulff|Ursula Pie Aidt|Michelle Bjørn-Andersen|Peter Christoffersen|Jeppe Vig Find|Djamel Guedouanni|Thomas Hwan|Irene Jarnved|Karin Lisbeth Hjorth Jensen|Bo Lönsson|Christian Mosbæk|Anni Nissen|Laura Kamis Wrang
title: En familie
